text: my data is not very interesting
description: You think nobody could possibly find your data interesting
You think people will draw the wrong conclusions from your data
You think your data can't be shared because it contains too many mistakes or is not up to date
You think your data are so big that sharing will be difficult or impossible
You think your data is too complicated for anyone else to understand

text: we will get too many inquiries
description: You think if you publish your data, you'll be inundated with questions and problems
